Name: The Fool
Reversed_: Holding back, recklessness, risk-taking

Name: The Magician
Reversed_: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

Name: The High Priestess
Upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious
Reversed_: Secrets, disconnect from intuition, withdrawal and silence

Name: The Empress
Reversed_: Creative block, dependence on others

Name: The Emperor
Reversed_: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility

Name: The Hierophant
Upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
Reversed_: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo

Name: The Lovers
Upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
Reversed_: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of virtues

Name: The Chariot
Reversed_: Self-discipline, oppostion, lack of direction

Name: Strength
Reversed_: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion

Name: The Hermit
Upright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
Reversed_: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

Name: Wheel of Fortune
Upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
Reversed_: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

Name: Justice
Upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
Reversed_: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonest

Name: The Hanged Man
Upright: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
Reversed_: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

Name: Death
Reversed_: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

Name: Temperance
Reversed_: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

Name: The Devil
Upright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
Reversed_: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

Name: The Tower
Upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
Reversed_: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

Name: The Star
Reversed_: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

Name: The Moon
Reversed_: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

Name: The Sun
Reversed_: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

Name: Judgment
Reversed_: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

Name: The World
Reversed_: Seeking personal closure, short-cuts, delays
